verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Years of time have come and gone
Since I first heard it told
How Jesus would come again someday.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
If back then it seemed so realm
Then I just can't help but feel
How much closer His coming is today.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Signs of the times are ev'ry where,
And there's a brand new feeling in the air.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Keep your eyes upon the eastern sky,
Lift up your head,
Redemption draweth nigh.

verse.name: v2a
v2b
verse.lines:
But the Word of God is true;
He'll redeem His chosen few.
Don't lose hope soon,
Christ Jesus will descend.
